markdownRemark.html:
Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris wrap up the first season of Osmosis with an outlook on what is still to come. We reflect on the first season and highlight future plans:

  • Reflection on the pilot season
  • Seasonal releases
  • Themes for episode content
  • Future plans for the cast

frontmatter.description: Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris wrap up the first season of Osmosis with an outlook on what is still to come. We reflect on the first season and highlight future plans.
frontmatter.title: Wrapping up season one of the Osmosis podcast
